Tucson musters all his strength to hoist himself onto all fours and transfo=
rms from the silver dragon into the silver dragon warrior. He narrows his e=
yes as he takes a solid stance and wields an impressive Ninjutsu katana wit=
h a silver dragon coiled around the hilt.

" I'm ready, it's time to find R=
odimus and free him of whatever demon is still tormenting him.  Then we ret=
rieve the Matrix and put it in maximum security for safe keeping.  After th=
at, he must not get it back.   The Matrix must be given to Leo Prime, where=
 I feel it belongs."

Nightshift looks to Tucson.

" I dunno Tucson, The Ma=
trix gave ya two upgrades already, I think that says a lot about ya."

Perp=
etually on the move and constantly busy.

      <p>LEO stood up and crossed over to where WI=
NG SABER was looking at the<br>
cordinates. He stroked his chin thoughtfull=
y. "That cordinate, how<br>
close will it get us?"<br>
<br>
WING SABER turn=
ed back to the console as he accessed the library<br>
computers. "Hmmm." He=
 said after a few moments. "It seems to be<br>
located somewhere inside of =
this."<br>
<br>
A picture shows up on the screen. It is an arial view of a =
very large<br>
jungle. "This picture was taken some time ago, but it is the=
<br>
approximate location that we recieved." WING SABER said.<br>
<br>
LEO =
turned back to the others. "Then you folks had better get your<br>
rechargi=
ng done, it seems that we have some exploring to do." He<br>
pointed back a=
t the picture, "And there is a lot of land to cover."<br>
<br>
WING SABER l=
ooked over at NIGHTLIGHT, "And what ever happens, we will<br>
do what ever =
we have to do to save Rodimus."<br>
<br>
There was a nod and a look of grim=
 determination on LEO's face. "he<br>
will be given every opportunity to re=
covered. I promise you."<br>
<br>
In the background, oblivious to the other=
s LEGACY, BUMP and SANTON<br>
were working on SILVERBOLT.<br>
